name: Ferocity
description:
Ferocity is a fps psychological horror indie game developed by MEDWARDS ART

I created this game in under two weeks of time for the SCREAM JAM 2019
https://itch.io/jam/scream-jam-2019

MEDWARDS ART
https://medwardsarts.weebly.com/

WARNING! This game is horror themed and has blood and violence !
I would not allow anyone under 13 to play this game !

Thanks for playing my game it means the world to me I hope to someday make bigger and better games!-mike

Story-

Seattle is under siege by a virus that transforms human DNA 
into mutant monster beasts among contact via scratch or bite.
Within 24 hours of first contact almost the entire city was taken over. 
The government has shutdown all access in and out in hopes of halting the virus from spreading.
Homebase traced the origins of theses monsters to the Top Secret underground  Science facility #74
Where Dr.Edwards has been working on a super human serum
for the government but it seems his tests have gone horribly wrong.
In a last stitch effort before bombing the virus and the PNW city Seattle out of extinction 
The government will send it the SPARTANS
(Spec. Para. American. Recon. Terrorism. Adavnced. Nutralization. Squad.)  
SPARTANS mission is to  head into Facility #74 
Find Dr.Edwards and his research in hope of finding a stop to this ferocity and save Seattle !
